object.name: Automatic Ballista
entries: Aiming the Automatic Ballista requires the {@action Utilize|XPHB} action. Then a creature can take the Ballista Bolt action.

object.name: Clockwork Trebuchet
entries: Pulling a lever of the Clockwork Trebuchet requires the {@action Utilize|XPHB} action. Then a creature can take the Trebuchet Stone action.

actionEntries.name: Trebuchet Stone (Requires Lever Pull)
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 30 feet of itself). Hit: 27 ({@damage 5d10}) Bludgeoning damage.

object.name: Decrepit Mangonel
entries: Loading a Decrepit Mangonel requires two {@action Utilize|XPHB} actions, and aiming it requires one {@action Utilize|XPHB} action. Then a creature can take the Sack of Hands action.

actionEntries.name: Sack of Hands (Requires Load and Aim)
entries: A launched sack of writhing hands lands in a space 30 to 100 feet away from the mangonel. A {@creature Swarm of Crawling Claws|XMM} appears where the sack lands.

object.name: Enchanted Ballista
entries: Loading the Enchanted Ballista requires the {@action Utilize|XPHB} action. Then a creature can take the Ballista Bolt action.

object.name: Forge Launcher
entries: Aiming the Forge Launcher requires the {@action Utilize|XPHB} action. Then a creature can take the Fiery Canister action.

actionEntries.name: Fiery Canister (Requires Aim)
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 20-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on a point 30 to 300 feet from the launcher. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

object.name: Storm Cannon
entries: Aiming a Storm Cannon requires the {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, then a creature can take the Lightning Ball action.
